data.scheme_name: Amrut Group Parshuram Loan Interest Reimbursement Scheme
data.benefits: The scheme reimburses interest up to 12%, with a maximum limit of Rs. 15 lakhs.
data.eligibility: Entrepreneurs from economically weaker sections of the open category who do not benefit from any independent government department/ institution/ corporation schemes and wish to start their own industry/business.
data.conditions:
At least 50% of the members of the applicant group must meet all the eligibility criteria set by the Amrut organization. 

If any group member has received training in business or entrepreneurship, a self-attested copy of the certificate must be included. The group must not be a defaulter with any bank or financial institution.
data.beneficiaries: Entrepreneurs from economically weaker sections of the open category who do not benefit from any independent government department/ institution/ corporation schemes and wish to start their own industry/business.
data.prerequisites:
At least 50% of the members of the applicant group must meet all the eligibility criteria set by the Amrut organization. 

If any group member has received training in business or entrepreneurship, a self-attested copy of the certificate must be included. The group must not be a defaulter with any bank or financial institution.
data.nodal_agency: Academy of Maharashtra Research, Upliftment and Training (AMRUT)
data.context:
The Amrut Group Parshuram Loan Interest Reimbursement Scheme is designed to support economically weaker sections in Maharashtra by reimbursing interest on loans taken by registered groups. 

Launched to encourage collective entrepreneurship and self-employment, the scheme aims to empower marginalized communities and foster economic growth through improved access to capital.
data.objective: The scheme aims to empower economically weaker sections by providing financial support for collective entrepreneurship, promoting self-employment, and enhancing economic development in marginalized communities.
data.description:
Interest Reimbursement : Reimburses interest on loans from approved institutions, capped at 12% per annum. 

Maximum Reimbursement Amount : Up to Rs. 15 lakh (Rupees Fifteen Lakhs) per group.
data.how_to_apply: The applicants can apply through https://apps.mssu.ac.in/Amrut/Login.aspx
data.funding_facilitator: Academy of Maharashtra Research, Upliftment and Training (AMRUT)
data.funding_mechanism: Incentive will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Application Form
Income Certificate
Age Proof
Business Idea Proposal
No Objection Certificate

data.beneficiary: All Industry - All Entities - Maharashtra - All MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
